desc: MILLIONHAIR Clip-in Hair Extensions come in a range of over 15 colours and are high quality Human Hair. 75% OFF! Balayage | Ombre | Shadow Root | Double Drawn 150g-300g. See our Professional range of Tools, Micro Rings, Extension Brush, Pliers, Tape. 70% Off - Cheap Quality Hair Extensions
